targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "contract_vet")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer", "chain_tag"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vet_price}") }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queued_stake")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer", "chain_tag"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vet_price}") }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: This shows the contract locked VET from `totalStake` function, vs the sum of all the validators stake

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_stake")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer", "chain_tag"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_stake_accumulated")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer", "chain_tag"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Contract Totals VET (Accumulated Vs Total) - Lines Should match

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vtho_issued")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag", "signer"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vtho_burned")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag", "signer"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validators_share")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag", "signer"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "delegators_share")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag", "signer"])

panels.description: This shows the contract locked weight from `totalStake` function, vs the sum of all the validators weight

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_weight" or r["_field"] == "accumulated_weight")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer", "chain_tag"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "accumulated_weight")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer", "chain_tag"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "price_api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vet_price")
  |> last()
list.label: VET / USD
list.name: vet_price
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "price_api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vet_price")
  |> last()

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "epoch_length",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "chain_config"
)
list.label: Epoch Length
list.name: epoch_length

)
